data.text: @icowrich @jenn_buckle @USMortality The article you linked is mostly right with its graphs, figures.  But the author confuses rate per 100k with absolute numbers and uses the wrong language in his first paragraph, making him technically incorrect.
@JeffBullard16 @icowrich @jenn_buckle Even those numbers are likely not accurate.

@icowrich @jenn_buckle @USMortality Vast majority of hospitalized are vaccinated, as you'd expect in such a highly vaccinated population.  About half of recent deaths are vaccinated, half unvaccinated.

Hospitalizations by vax status left, deaths by vax status right https://t.co/otr3Jopd8i
@Right2LeftUK @USMortality If it were 0.00002%, sure. But it's 2%.

@JeffBullard16 @jenn_buckle @USMortality Yes, indeed that is true. But, 10% of its population stubbornly remains unvaxxed. That number hasn't moved in many months. And that's the portion of the population getting severely ill and dying: https://t.co/oQ35E6cneK
@USMortality @medecentral Israel is the 67th most vaccinated nation. https://t.co/wHrJEJqRLW
